definition: just a while before/not so long ago/everyone can remember when..

sentences.english: Population can increase in a geometric ratio .
sentences.chinese: 人口可以按几何级数增长。

sentences.english: One is to argue geometrically that you have a right angle in here.
sentences.chinese: 第一种是几何办法，这是一个直角。

sentences.english: Therefore, many notions that apply to rings and homomorphisms stem from geometric intuition.
sentences.chinese: 从而，环与同态中许多概念都源于几何直觉。

sentences.english: A trolley equipment for rail profile measurement is developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制了一种手推式钢轨外形几何尺寸测量系统。

sentences.english: For the sphere, that unique geometry is the perfectly spherical sphere.
sentences.chinese: 对于球来说，这个唯一的几何就是正圆球面。

sentences.english: A four cone blackbody cavity was obtained by simulating the blackbody with geometric-optical method.
sentences.chinese: 用几何光学方法模拟黑体，得一四锥黑体腔。

sentences.english: A complex geometric model can be expressed with finite terms of the V-series accurately.
sentences.chinese: 对复杂的几何造型，可以用V级数的有限项精确表示。

sentences.english: Weighted geometric means combination forecasting is a kind of nonlinear combination forecasting method.
sentences.chinese: 加权几何平均组合预测为一种非线性的组合预测方法。

sentences.english: The geometry of the sans serif, all-caps typography provided that tie.
sentences.chinese: 几何形状的无衬，全帽印刷术提供配合。

sentences.english: In the case of non-Euclidean geometry he published no definitive work.
sentences.chinese: 至于非欧几里德几何，他没有发表过权威性的著作。

sentences.english: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 将局部几何变换平移指定尺寸。

sentences.english: Some objects of refined terracotta were decorated with zoomorphic and geometric designs.
sentences.chinese: 细泥陶上常有彩绘的几何图案或动物形花纹。

sentences.english: A database is established for representing the structure and geometric properties of the workpieces.
sentences.chinese: 数据库表示工件的结构和几何特性。

sentences.english: Using this invariability, the geometrical distortion is first retrieved.
sentences.chinese: 使用这种不变性，首先检索的几何失真。

sentences.english: The counter-revolutionary gang was on the rampage for a time, but before long it was completely overthrown.
sentences.chinese: 猖獗一时的反革命匪帮，曾几何时，遭到了彻底覆灭。

sentences.english: Its advantages are simple geometry, radial load carrying capacity and high.
sentences.chinese: 它的长处是复杂的几何体，径向负荷承载才能和高。

definition: projective geometry/same as 射影幾何|射影几何
